targets.rawSql: SELECT * FROM "{{TIME_TABLE}}" WHERE path_group_metric LIKE '%WNS'

panels.title: WNS of path groups across stages

targets.rawSql: SELECT * FROM "{{TIME_TABLE}}" WHERE path_group_metric LIKE '%TNS'
SELECT * FROM "{{TIME_TABLE}}" WHERE path_group_metric LIKE '%FEPS'
SELECT * FROM "{{TIME_TABLE}}"

SELECT 
    'floorplan' AS run,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'floorplan_combinational_count' THEN value END) AS combinational_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'floorplan_buffer/inverter_count' THEN value END) AS buffer_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'floorplan_sequential_count' THEN value END) AS sequential_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'floorplan_macro_count' THEN value END) AS macro_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'floorplan_latch_count' THEN value END) AS latch_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'floorplan_flop_count' THEN value END) AS flop_count
FROM 
    "{{RUN_TABLE}}"
WHERE 
    metric ilike '%floorplan%count%'

SELECT 
    'place' AS run,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'place_combinational_count' THEN value END) AS combinational_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'place_buffer/inverter_count' THEN value END) AS buffer_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'place_sequential_count' THEN value END) AS sequential_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'place_macro_count' THEN value END) AS macro_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'place_latch_count' THEN value END) AS latch_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'place_icg_count' THEN value END) AS icg_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'place_physical_count' THEN value END) AS physical_count
FROM 
    "{{RUN_TABLE}}"
WHERE 
    metric ilike '%place%count%'

    'cts' AS run,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'cts_combinational_count' THEN value END) AS combinational_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'cts_buffer/inverter_count' THEN value END) AS buffer_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'cts_sequential_count' THEN value END) AS sequential_count,

    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'cts_latch_count' THEN value END) AS latch_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'cts_icg_count' THEN value END) AS icg_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'cts_physical_count' THEN value END) AS physical_count
FROM 
    "{{RUN_TABLE}}"
WHERE

    'route' AS run,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'route_combinational_count' THEN value END) AS combinational_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'route_buffer/inverter_count' THEN value END) AS buffer_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'route_sequential_count' THEN value END) AS sequential_count,

    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'route_icg_count' THEN value END) AS icg_count,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'route_physical_count' THEN value END) AS physical_count
FROM

SELECT 
    'floorplan' AS run,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'floorplan_combo_area' THEN value END) AS combinational_area,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'floorplan_buffer_area' THEN value END) AS buffer_area,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'floorplan_physical_area' THEN value END) AS physical_area,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'floorplan_icgs_area' THEN value END) AS icgs_area,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'floorplan_latch_area' THEN value END) AS latch_area
FROM 
    "{{RUN_TABLE}}"
WHERE 
    metric ilike '%floorplan%area%'

SELECT 
    'place' AS run,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'place_combinational_area' THEN value END) AS combinational_area,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'place_buffer/inverter_area' THEN value END) AS buffer_area,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'place_sequential_area' THEN value END) AS sequential_area,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'place_macro_area' THEN value END) AS macro_area,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'place_latch_area' THEN value END) AS latch_area,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'place_icgs_area' THEN value END) AS icg_area,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'place_physical_area' THEN value END) AS physical_area
FROM

SELECT 
    'cts' AS run,

    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'cts_buffer/inverter_area' THEN value END) AS buffer_area,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'cts_sequential_area' THEN value END) AS sequential_area,

SELECT 
    'route' AS run,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'route_combinational_area' THEN value/100000 END) AS combinational_area,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'route_sequential_area' THEN value/100000 END) AS sequential_area,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'route_buffer/inverter_area' THEN value/100000 END) AS buffer_area,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'route_physical_area' THEN value/100000 END) AS physical_area,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'route_icgs_area' THEN value/100000 END) AS icgs_area,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'route_macro_area' THEN value/100000 END) AS macro_area,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric ilike 'route_latch_area' THEN value/100000 END) AS latch_area
FROM 
    "{{RUN_TABLE}}"
WHERE 
    metric ilike '%route%area%'

WITH formatted_panel AS (
    SELECT
        CASE 
            WHEN metric ilike 'floorplan_density(%)' THEN 'floorplan'
            WHEN metric ilike 'place_density(%)' THEN 'place'
            WHEN metric ilike 'cts_density(%)' THEN 'cts'
            WHEN metric ilike 'route_density(%)' THEN 'route'
        END AS density_type,
        value
    FROM (SELECT * FROM "{{RUN_TABLE}}" WHERE metric LIKE '%density%')
)
SELECT 
    'Density(%)' AS parameter,
    MAX(CASE WHEN density_type ilike 'floorplan' THEN value END) AS floorplan,
    MAX(CASE WHEN density_type ilike 'place' THEN value END) AS place,
    MAX(CASE WHEN density_type ilike 'cts' THEN value END) AS cts,
    MAX(CASE WHEN density_type ilike 'route' THEN value END) AS route
FROM formatted_panel;

WITH formatted_panel AS (
    SELECT
        CASE 
            WHEN metric LIKE 'floorplan_power(%)' THEN 'floorplan'
            WHEN metric LIKE 'place_power(%)' THEN 'place'
            WHEN metric LIKE 'cts_power(%)' THEN 'cts'
            WHEN metric LIKE 'route_power(%)' THEN 'route'
        END AS stage,
        CASE
            WHEN metric LIKE '%(Internal)' THEN 'internal power'
            WHEN metric LIKE '%(switching)' THEN 'switching power'
            WHEN metric LIKE '%(leakage)' THEN 'leakage power'
            WHEN metric LIKE '%(total)' THEN 'total power'
        END AS power_type,
        value
    FROM "{{RUN_TABLE}}" WHERE metric ilike '%power%'
)
SELECT 
    stage,
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN power_type ilike 'internal power' THEN value END), 0) AS "internal power",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN power_type ilike 'switching power' THEN value END), 0) AS "switching power",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN power_type ilike 'leakage power' THEN value END), 0) AS "leakage power"
FROM formatted_panel
GROUP BY stage
ORDER BY 
    CASE stage 
        WHEN 'floorplan' THEN 1
        WHEN 'place' THEN 2
        WHEN 'cts' THEN 3
        WHEN 'route' THEN 4
    END;
SELECT * FROM "{{RUN_TABLE}}" WHERE metric ilike '%power%total%'

WITH formatted_overflow AS (
    SELECT
        CASE 
            WHEN metric LIKE 'place_overflow(%)' THEN 'place'
            WHEN metric LIKE 'cts_overflow(%)' THEN 'cts'
        END AS stage,
        CASE
            WHEN metric LIKE '%(H%)' THEN 'overflow_H'
            WHEN metric LIKE '%(V%)' THEN 'overflow_V'
        END AS overflow_type,
        value
    FROM (SELECT * FROM "{{RUN_TABLE}}" WHERE metric ilike '%overflow%')
)
SELECT 
    overflow_type AS parameter,
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN stage ilike 'place' THEN value END), 0) AS "place",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN stage ilike 'cts' THEN value END), 0) AS "cts"
FROM formatted_overflow
GROUP BY overflow_type
ORDER BY 
    CASE overflow_type 
        WHEN 'overflow_H' THEN 1
        WHEN 'overflow_V' THEN 2
    END;

WITH formatted_panel AS (
    SELECT
        CASE 
            WHEN metric LIKE 'place_Hotspot(max)' THEN 'place'
            WHEN metric LIKE 'cts_Hotspot(max)' THEN 'cts'
            WHEN metric LIKE 'place_Hotspot(total)' THEN 'place'
            WHEN metric LIKE 'cts_Hotspot(total)' THEN 'cts'
        END AS category,
        CASE
            WHEN metric LIKE '%(max)' THEN 'max_hotspot'
            WHEN metric LIKE '%(total)' THEN 'total_hotspot'
        END AS parameter,
        value
    FROM (SELECT * FROM "{{RUN_TABLE}}" WHERE metric ilike '%hotspot%' AND metric NOT ilike 'floorplan%')
)
SELECT 
    parameter,
    MAX(CASE WHEN category ilike 'place' THEN value END) AS place,
    MAX(CASE WHEN category ilike 'cts' THEN value END) AS cts
FROM formatted_panel
GROUP BY parameter;
SELECT * FROM "{{RUN_TABLE}}" WHERE metric ilike '%time%'

WITH formatted_qor AS (
    SELECT
        CASE 
            WHEN metric LIKE 'floorplan_%' THEN 'floorplan'
            WHEN metric LIKE 'place_%' THEN 'place'
            WHEN metric LIKE 'cts_%' THEN 'cts'
            WHEN metric LIKE 'route_%' THEN 'route'
        END AS stage,
        REGEXP_REPLACE(metric, '^(floorplan_|place_|cts_|route_)', '') AS parameter,
        value
    FROM (SELECT * FROM "{{RUN_TABLE}}")
)
SELECT 
    parameter,
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN stage ilike 'floorplan' THEN value END), 0) AS "floorplan",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN stage ilike 'place' THEN value END), 0) AS "place",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN stage ilike 'cts' THEN value END), 0) AS "cts",
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN stage ilike 'route' THEN value END), 0) AS "route"
FROM formatted_qor
GROUP BY parameter
ORDER BY parameter;
SELECT * FROM "{{DRC_TABLE}}"
